Main.title: The ultimate <important>SaaS template</important> designed to help you effortlessly launch and grow your business!
Main.description: A free and open-source landing page template for your SaaS business, built with React, TypeScript, Shadcn UI, and Tailwind CSS.

Features.section_title: Unlock the Full Potential of the SaaS Template
Features.section_description: A free and open-source landing page template for your SaaS business, built with React, TypeScript, Shadcn UI, and Tailwind CSS.
Features.feature1_description: Next.js is a React-based web framework that supports server-side rendering (SSR) and static site generation (SSG) to optimise SEO and performance. It boosts development productivity with built-in features like routing, code splitting, API routes, and more. Flexible choice of rendering methods to meet different needs.
Features.feature2_description: React is a JavaScript library for creating user interfaces that leverages a component-based architecture and a virtual DOM for efficient rendering. It is suitable for developing a wide range of web applications, from large-scale applications to simple UIs.
Features.feature3_description: Tailwind CSS is a utility class-based CSS framework that helps you write styles efficiently. It improves development productivity by allowing you to quickly construct UIs by combining predefined classes.
Features.feature4_description: TypeScript is a programming language that adds static types to JavaScript, making your code more readable and reliable. Its robust type system and support for the latest JavaScript features make it ideal for developing large-scale applications.
Features.feature5_description: Shadcn UI is a React component library integrated with Tailwind CSS that provides a sleek design and easy customisation. Its modular component structure allows for flexible and efficient UI development.
Features.feature6_description: Radix UI is an accessible and flexible UI component library for React applications. It provides a variety of basic components that make it easy for developers to build user interfaces.

FirstHero.title: Build an efficient and secure collaboration environment
FirstHero.description: It's easy to integrate with your existing systems, adjust settings to achieve maximum efficiency, collaborate with team members in a safe environment, and provide the highest level of security measures to ensure data safety.
FirstHero.reviewer_opinion: nextjs boilerplate is revolutionary - it has quickly streamlined our data processes!

SecondHero.title: A new standard for collaboration: Safety and convenience
SecondHero.description: Easily connect and customise everything to your liking, safely collaborate with colleagues in real time, and protect your data with the latest security features.
SecondHero.reviewer_opinion: The nextjs boilerplate has revolutionised our development process - smooth, secure, and simple!

Process.title: The Complete Guide to Next.js Boilerplate
Process.description: This guide introduces you to all the features of Next.js boilerplate and walks you through how to install and use them step-by-step. Discover the benefits and unique selling points of each feature, easily install them, and put them to good use with common use cases.
Process.step1_description: Learn all the features of the Next.js boilerplate, and see the benefits and unique selling points of each feature.
Process.step2_description: Make it easy with our step-by-step guide on how to install Boilerplate.
Process.step3_description: After installation, we'll show you how to use the Next.js boilerplate and explain common use cases.

Pricing.section_title: Great the SaaS Template Starts With a Plan
Pricing.section_description: SaaS templates starting at the right price! Efficient and simple solutions that give you the opportunity to grow your business further.

FAQ.section_description: Find answers to common questions about Next.js Boilerplate and learn how to get started quickly.
FAQ.answer1: Next.js Boilerplate provides basic Next.js setup, as well as routing, state management, API communication, styling, test setup, and more. This allows developers to get started quickly and easily add the features they need.
FAQ.question2: How do I install this project?
FAQ.answer2: Next.js Boilerplate is available by cloning it from GitHub. Simply follow the installation guide to install the necessary dependencies, set up environment variables, and start the development server with the npm run dev command.
FAQ.question3: What is the licence for Next.js Boilerplate?
FAQ.answer3: Next.js Boilerplate is under the MIT licence. This allows anyone to use, modify, and distribute it freely. However, you must retain the original copyright and licence notices.
FAQ.question4: How do I implement user authentication in Next.js Boilerplate?
FAQ.answer4: Next.js Boilerplate provides a basic structure for user authentication. It's set up to make it easy to integrate authentication methods like JSON Web Token (JWT) or OAuth, and you can see how to implement them in the related documentation.
FAQ.question5: How easy is it to customise Next.js Boilerplate?
FAQ.answer5: Next.js Boilerplate is designed with a modular structure, making it easy to customise to your needs. You're free to modify and add components, pages, API routes, and more, and the documentation provides a guide on how to customise it.

CTA.title: Ready to join us?
CTA.description: Let's grow together through new opportunities, build a better future, start a new business, and get on the path to success!
